title: Klobuchar to launch Iowa bus tour after debate
text:
Amy Klobuchar is kicking off a three-day bus tour through Iowa following Tuesday's presidential debate in Ohio, according to a schedule shared with POLITICO.

The Minnesota senator, a moderate Democrat who has centered her bid on winning back Midwestern states that flipped to President Donald Trump in 2016, plans to swing through a dozen counties on the tour, which will run from Oct. 18 to Oct. 20.

Story Continued Below

Iowa is of particular importance for the neighboring senator. Klobuchar has struggled to break through the sprawling 2020 Democratic presidential primary field, averaging just over 1 percent in national polling, according to RealClearPolitics' polling average. But in Iowa, Klobuchar got more optimistic results in a recent poll from Focus on Rural America, which found her at 8 percent. But in Iowa, Klobuchar has gotten better results, peaking at 8 percent support in a recent poll from Focus on Rural America.
